text: By the way I've invited you all to Hubspot. It's a CRM so that we can share contacts
<@U0ARRNM3R>: +1
If anyone  has a different opinion and wants to weigh in here, please do ^^

<@U177W7XH8>, I'd rather open it up right now. The people who are signing up at this moment are probably pretty engaged already and it's a good moment for us to gauge what topics people are really working on right now
<@U0ARRNM3R>: yep!
<@U177W7XH8>, no we don't, that's why I mentioned <@U17C0L2VA> :wink:
Maybe we can send them a survey with predefined topics? Might be easier
<@U0D6EPESC>, great! Does that mean you're a fan of the personal email rather than a generalized one?
<@U0ARRNM3R>: I'm okay being the sender, as long as I have ghostwriters :ghost:
Okay so do we have a template for the email lists or are we just using bulletpoints?
We can, but then we'll lose the personal touch
I don't mind sending the emails. I like the approach, we can just say: 'Cheers, Team Offcourse' ?
Aah ok
<@U177W7XH8>, no but we discussed sending curated lists through email until the platform was finished (during the team day)

Please give me feedback on: whether you think this is a good approach/what can be improved upon and who should send the email. I'm more than happy to do so, but my guess is that most people will sign up through Jan Hein, so maybe he should be the one
That's great, but is the platform ready so show lists?

>Hi …,

How are you? Just saw that you joined and that means a lot to me. Offcourse_ is grown fast and I love that you are now part of it! 

The platform isn’t finished yet, but we’re working hard on it. In the mean time, you can expect the occasional curated lists of (coding) resources in your inbox.

I thought I’d ask you what topics you are interested in. What are you looking to learn? I’d love to hear from you, so we can tailor our curation efforts to your interests.

Thanks again for joining us! We’re happy to have you on board.

Cheers,
…

<@U177W7XH8> and I already spoke about how it would be a good idea to reach out to subscribers and ask them what topics they are interested in. We can automate this, but since we won't have 100+ subscribers per day, I thought we'd send a personal email. I wrote a draft:

<!channel>: hi everyone, I just noticed we have three subscribers to our mailing list, so it's time to reach out and get everything in motion (from design <@U17C0L2VA> to content @myself) to send out a first curated list.
